additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Glycerin (plant derived), Sodium Coco Fatty Alcohol Sulphate (plant derived), Cocamidopropyl Betaine (plant derived), Cocamide MEA (plant derived), Eucalyptus Oil, *Desert Lime Extract, Lemongrass Oil, Citric Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Chloride, Dehydroacetic Acid, Lime Oil, *Lemon Myrtle Oil. *Australian Native ingredient

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: For external use only. If eye contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Store below 30C.

description: Bosisto's Desert Lime & Eucalyptus Hand Wash Refill
name: Desert Lime & Eucalyptus Hand Wash Refill
